site.name: SecureFleet
site.description: Training lab: unsigned JWT enables admin access and sensitive data exposure.

challenge.title: Unsigned JWT Allows Admin Access
challenge.description: This lab demonstrates how a JWT not verified server-side allows administrative access and exfiltration of sensitive data.
challenge.element_to_proof: Access /admin by forging a JWT with sub=administrator and retrieve the full PAYMENT_API_KEY value.
challenge.walkthrough:
Title: Admin Access via Unsigned JWT

Question: What type of token is used to manage the session?
Hint: Inspect the GET /my-account request after login.
Solution: The cookie is a JWT.

Question: Does the server validate the JWT signature?
Hint: Modify the payload, re-encode the JWT with an invalid or empty signature, then send it back.
Solution: The server accepts the JWT even if the signature is invalid.

Question: How to obtain an administrator role?
Hint: Change the sub claim to administrator.
Solution: Access /admin with the modified JWT.

Question: What sensitive information is available at /admin?
Hint: Look for a "Configuration" or "API Keys" section.
Solution: Extract the PAYMENT_API_KEY value.

Final Flag Info: Exact value of PAYMENT_API_KEY.

lab_readme.title: Unsigned JWT Allows Admin Access
lab_readme.description: This lab demonstrates how a server that does not verify JWT signatures can grant administrative access and leak sensitive data.
objectives: Identify a JWT that is not properly verified
Modify the JWT payload to escalate privileges
Locate and exfiltrate a sensitive API key
lab_readme.prerequisites: Knowledge of JWTs, Burp Suite or similar
